NY Frost Factory

NY Frost Factory is a start-up Taiwanese snow dessert shop based in New York City. Managed their social media accounts and website. By developing ad campaigns and daily photo updates, the store's following grew to over 4,000+. Created video content for Business Insider and ABC7 which generated over 1,500,000 views. Developed menu items and menu layout in store and online to help guide customers about flavor choices.
